info.name: Purchase Orders
info.description: In Concur Invoice, purchase orders are requests for a vendor to supply goods or services. This API provides methods to create a new purchase order, or view or update an existing purchase order.

request.description: Retrieves information about the specified purchase order.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

request.description: Creates a purchase order and returns the status of the creation request.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

request.description: Updates the specified purchase order and returns the status of the update request.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
